abstract: Ron Paul does not raise a lot of cash from wealthy donors, but his supporters -- many of them college students -- contribute in droves.
snippet: Ron Paul does not raise a lot of cash from wealthy donors, but his supporters -- many of them college students -- contribute in droves.
lead_paragraph: Representative Ron Paul of Texas raised more than $8 million in the last three months, another demonstration of the willingness of his followers to dig into their pockets.

headline.main: Paul Raises $8 Million From More Than 100,000 Donors
